title: Moby's New Typeface
content:
Does anyone know what the font is that Moby is currently using for his new albums/singles.

Looks like montag to me, though I could be wrong...

SOME EXAMPLES:  
 [http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51E48-tJyhL.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011101/http:/ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51E48-tJyhL.jpg "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51E48-tJyhL.jpg")  
 [http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51NXK3hBZWL.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011101/http:/ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51NXK3hBZWL.jpg "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51NXK3hBZWL.jpg")  
 [http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/519cs8FSq1L.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011101/http:/ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/519cs8FSq1L.jpg "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/519cs8FSq1L.jpg")  
 [http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51aeVTOWqML.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011101/http:/ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51aeVTOWqML.jpg "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51aeVTOWqML.jpg")

 [‹ Flattened off condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011101/http:/typophile.com/node/50341 "Go to previous forum topic") [B&W typeface ID please ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011101/http:/typophile.com/node/50359 "Go to next forum topic")
author: adamschoales

comments.content: yes bryant is closer. i can use that for now...

Bryant Alternatives (from Village) are closer, but it’s not an ID. I’m interested also.

Edit: Bryant Alt 2, if …
poms - When you say Village, do you mean [Process](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011101/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Process%252BType%252BFoundry)?

Argh, all those foundries – sorry i “meant” …  
Process Type Foundry  
700 Washington Avenue North #611  
Minneapolis, MN 55401  
USA!
